Authors:
Alexandre Gonçalves dos Santos Silva-Filho, Mariana Sá,
Felipe Wartchow
Title:
Lactifluus catolensis (Russulaceae/Russulales): a new species
of subgenus Lactoriopsis
Keywords:
brazilian milkcaps, Caatinga, campos rupestre, new taxon,
phylogeny
Abstract:
A new species, Lactifluus catolensis, phylogenetically
related to Lf. subiculatus is proposed based on morphological and
molecular data. Lactifluus catolensis is placed in subgenus
Lactoriopsis. Morphologically, Lf. catolensis is characterized by the
set of features as: pileus and stipe size, width pseudopleurocystidia,
up to 25 µm diam., fusiform, some with the upper median portion inflated
and mucronate apex, short and scarses thick walled elements in
lampropalisade.
